docs.lead_paragraph: Last year, for the first time, more babies here were adopted by South Koreans than foreigners and the government has set a goal of eliminating foreign adoptions altogether by 2012.

headline.main: Korea Aims to End Stigma of Adoption and Stop ‘Exporting’ Babies
headline.sub: Giving a Push To a Fading Bias;
headline.print_headline: Korea Aims to End Stigma of Adoption and Stop ‘Exporting’ Babies

docs.snippet: Last year, for the first time, more babies here were adopted by South Koreans than foreigners and the government has set a goal of eliminating foreign adoptions altogether by 2012.
